content: penis can sleeve free pattern by jacob stevne jørgensen @krejacob stevne when publishing your work please indicate the designer of the pattern you are not allowed to sell the pattern nor the finished product materials hook 5mm h tapestry needle stuffing for the balls yarn i used filcolana peruvian highland wool and drops nepal but any yarn for hook 5mm will do color a the color of the shaft <50 g color b the color of the glans 25 g color c a few cm black yarn to embroider the meatus abbreviations magic_ring magical ring single_crochet single_crochet increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease decrease by single crocheting 2 stitches together no of stitches at the end of the round * repeat section between two * until the end of the round pattern shaft use color a 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet 6 2 *increase* 12 3 *single_crochet increase* 18 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* 24 5 *3 single_crochet increase* 30 6 *2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet* 36 now the bottom is finished and we start the shaft 7 *single_crochet* 36 repeat round 7 until your sleeve covers all but 1cm of the can approximately 24 rounds now we crochet the lower part of the glans change to color b 1-2 *single_crochet* 36 3 *3 single_crochet increase* 45 from here on we stop working in the round and start crocheting back and forth turn with a chain not included in stitch count 4 decrease 41 single_crochet decrease 43 turn with a chain 5 decrease 39 single_crochet decrease 41 turn with a chain 6 decrease 37 decrease 39 slip_stitch fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing tip with color b 1 magic_ring 5 single_crochet 5 2 *increase* 10 3 *single_crochet increase* 15 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* 20 5 *3 single_crochet increase* 25 6 *2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet* 30 7 *5 sv increase* 35 8 *single_crochet* 35 9 *3 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet* 40 10 *single_crochet* 40 11 *7 single_crochet increase* 45 12 *single_crochet* 45 slip_stitch fasten_off leave a tail for sewing balls make 2 with color a 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet 6 2 *increase* 12 3 *single_crochet increase* 18 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* 24 5 *3 single_crochet increase* 30 6-8 *single_crochet* 30 9 *single_crochet decrease* 20 20 *decrease* 10 assemly instructions 1 fold down the glans along the increase round round 3 of the glans and sew it to the shaft with a few stitches 2 stuff balls and sew onto the shaft on the side where the glans has a v shape 3 sew the tip on the opposite side of the v shape approximately 10 stitches 4 with color c embroider meatus and you re done
